page.title: 24Skipping Games
page.content:
We surveyed the whole school to see what the most popular skipping game was. However most pupils don't like skipping. In P6/7 the most popular game was "The Flying Haggis" (31%). In P4/5/6, there was a tie between "Flying Haggis" (17%), "Skipping Race" (17%) and "ABC" (17%). In P3/4 only two pupils enjoyed skipping, they both loved "ABC". In P1/2 the most popular game was "Skipping Tag" (16%). Overall the most popular skipping games, was a tie between "ABC" (13%) and "Flying Haggis" (13%).


Milesmark Primary School
